verses.verse: In those<WH1992> days<WH3117> there<WH369> was no<WH369> king<WH4428> of Israel;<WH3478> and in those<WH1992> days<WH3117> the tribe<WH7626> of the Danites<WH1839> was seeking<WH1245> an inheritance<WH5159> for themselves to live<WH3427> in, for until<WH5704> that day<WH3117> an inheritance<WH5159> had not been allotted<WH5307> to them as a possession<WH5159> among<WH8432> the tribes<WH7626> of Israel.<WH3478>

And he said<WH559> to them, "Thus<WH2090> and so<WH2088> has Micah<WH4318> done<WH6213> to me, and he has hired<WH7936> me, and I have<WH1961> become<WH1961> his priest.<WH3548>"
And they said<WH559> to him, "Inquire<WH7592> of God,<WH430> please,<WH4994> that we may know<WH3045> whether our way<WH1870> on which<WH834> we are going<WH1980> will be prosperous.<WH6743>"
And the priest<WH3548> said<WH559> to them, "Go<WH1980> in peace;<WH7965> your way<WH1870> in which<WH834> you are going<WH1980> has the Lord's approval.<WH5227>"

Then the five<WH2568> men<WH376> departed<WH1980> and came<WH935> to Laish<WH3919> and saw<WH7200> the people<WH5971> who<WH834> were in it living<WH3427> in security,<WH983> after the manner<WH4941> of the Sidonians,<WH6722> quiet<WH8252> and secure;<WH982> for there<WH369> was no<WH369> ruler<WH3423> <WH6114> humiliating<WH3637> [them] for anything<WH1697> in the land,<WH776> and they were far<WH7350> from the Sidonians<WH6722> and had<WH369> no<WH369> dealings<WH1697> with anyone.<WH120>
When they came<WH935> back to their brothers<WH251> at Zorah<WH6881> and Eshtaol,<WH847> their brothers<WH251> said<WH559> to them, "What<WH4100> [do] you [report?]"

And they said,<WH559> "Arise,<WH6965> and let us go<WH5927> up against<WH5921> them; for we have seen<WH7200> the land,<WH776> and behold,<WH2009> it is very<WH3966> good.<WH2896> And will you sit<WH2814> still<WH2814>? Do not delay<WH6101> to go,<WH1980> to enter,<WH935> to possess<WH3423> the land.<WH776>

"When you enter,<WH935> you shall come<WH935> to a secure<WH982> people<WH5971> with a spacious<WH7342> <WH3027> land;<WH776> for God<WH430> has given<WH5414> it into your hand,<WH3027> a place<WH4725> where<WH834> <WH8033> there<WH369> is no<WH369> lack<WH4270> of anything<WH3605> <WH1697> that is on the earth.<WH776>"

Then from the family<WH4940> of the Danites,<WH1839> from Zorah<WH6881> and from Eshtaol,<WH847> six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> men<WH376> armed<WH2296> with weapons<WH3627> of war<WH4421> set<WH5265> out.

Then the five<WH2568> men<WH376> who went<WH1980> to spy<WH7270> out the country<WH776> of Laish<WH3919> answered<WH6030> and said<WH559> to their kinsmen,<WH251> "Do you know<WH3045> that there<WH3426> are in these<WH428> houses<WH1004> an ephod<WH646> and household<WH8655> idols<WH8655> and a graven<WH6459> image<WH6459> and a molten<WH4541> image<WH4541>? And they turned<WH5493> aside<WH5493> there<WH8033> and came<WH935> to the house<WH1004> of the young<WH5288> man,<WH5288> the Levite,<WH3881> to the house<WH1004> of Micah,<WH4318> and asked<WH7592> him of his welfare.<WH7965>

And the six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> men<WH376> armed<WH2296> with their weapons<WH3627> of war,<WH4421> who<WH834> were of the sons<WH1121> of Dan,<WH1835> stood<WH5324> by the entrance<WH6607> of the gate.<WH8179>

Now the five<WH2568> men<WH376> who went<WH1980> to spy<WH7270> out the land<WH776> went<WH5927> up [and] entered<WH935> there,<WH8033> [and] took<WH3947> the graven<WH6459> image<WH6459> and the ephod<WH646> and household<WH8655> idols<WH8655> and the molten<WH4541> image,<WH4541> while the priest<WH3548> stood<WH5324> by the entrance<WH6607> of the gate<WH8179> with the six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> men<WH376> armed<WH2296> with weapons<WH3627> of war.<WH4421>

And when these<WH428> went<WH935> into Micah's house<WH1004> and took<WH3947> the graven<WH6459> image,<WH6459> the ephod<WH646> and household<WH8655> idols<WH8655> and the molten<WH4541> image,<WH4541> the priest<WH3548> said<WH559> to them, "What<WH4100> are you doing<WH6213>?"

And they said<WH559> to him, "Be silent,<WH2790> put<WH7760> your hand<WH3027> over<WH5921> your mouth<WH6310> and come<WH1980> with us, and be to us a father and a priest.<WH1> Is it better<WH3548> for you to be a priest<WH2896> to the house<WH3548> of one<WH1004> man,<WH259> or<WH376> to be priest<WH176> to a tribe<WH3548> and a family<WH7626> in Israel<WH4940>?"

And the priest's heart<WH3820> was glad,<WH3190> and he took<WH3947> the ephod<WH646> and household<WH8655> idols<WH8655> and the graven<WH6459> image,<WH6459> and went<WH935> among<WH7130> the people.<WH5971>
Then they turned<WH6437> and departed,<WH1980> and put<WH7760> the little<WH2945> ones<WH2945> and the livestock<WH4735> and the valuables<WH3520> in front<WH6440> of them.

When they had gone<WH7368> some<WH7368> distance<WH7368> from the house<WH1004> of Micah,<WH4318> the men<WH376> who<WH834> [were] in the houses<WH1004> near<WH5973> Micah's house<WH1004> assembled<WH2199> and overtook<WH1692> the sons<WH1121> of Dan.<WH1835>

And they cried<WH7121> to the sons<WH1121> of Dan,<WH1835> who turned<WH5437> around<WH6440> and said<WH559> to Micah,<WH4318> "What<WH4100> is [the matter] with you, that you have assembled<WH2199> together<WH2199>?"

And he said,<WH559> "You have taken<WH3947> away my gods<WH430> which<WH834> I made,<WH6213> and the priest,<WH3548> and have gone<WH1980> away, and what<WH4100> do I have besides<WH5750>? So how<WH4100> <WH2088> can you say<WH559> to me, 'What<WH4100> is [the matter] with you?'"

And the sons<WH1121> of Dan<WH1835> said<WH559> to him, "Do not let your voice<WH6963> be heard<WH8085> among<WH5973> us, lest<WH6435> fierce<WH4751> <WH5315> men<WH376> fall<WH6293> upon you and you lose<WH622> your life,<WH5315> with the lives<WH5315> of your household.<WH1004>"

So the sons<WH1121> of Dan<WH1835> went<WH1980> on their way;<WH1870> and when Micah<WH4318> saw<WH7200> that they were too<WH4480> strong<WH2389> for him, he turned<WH6437> and went<WH7725> back<WH7725> to his house.<WH1004>

Then they took<WH3947> what<WH834> Micah<WH4318> had made<WH6213> and the priest<WH3548> who<WH834> had<WH1961> belonged<WH1961> to him, and came<WH935> to Laish,<WH3919> to a people<WH5971> quiet<WH8252> and secure,<WH982> and struck<WH5221> them with the edge<WH6310> of the sword;<WH2719> and they burned<WH8313> the city<WH5892> with fire.<WH784>
